wikipedia_page.main: Clive Branson (born 1951 in Cardiff) is a Welsh angler who won the individual World Freshwater Angling Championships in 1987 after being runner-up in 1986.Clive produces Gold Medal ground bait and is synonymous with bagging up on waters all around the country Clive is admin for the Match fishing page on Facebook that has over 25000 subscribers. Clive is currently ranked Number 1 Angler in wales, narrowly beating Hugh Scott for the top spot.

response: *British Soldier in India: The Letters of Clive Branson (1945), with introduction by Harry Pollitt.
* Clive Branson works at the Tate gallery
